about-me.title: I'm Aide√© Casillas, a Junior Software Developer 100% Mexican
about-me.description: I am currently a student in cross-platform software development engineering at the Technological University of L√©on. I combine my passion for technology with my creativity to build apps that solve real problems. It motivates me to constantly learn and collaborate on projects that generate impact.
about-me.p1: I am a person proactive and charismatic, with a deep passion for numbers, science and mathematics . What made me fall in love with cross-platform software development engineering was discovering an incredibly dynamic where every day brings new tools, technologies and challenges to solve. This constant evolution fuels my natural curiosity and my love of continuous learning. My background is enriched by my passion for artistic and aesthetic value, elements that I apply when designing intuitive interfaces and memorable user experiences, In addition to my reading taste which broadens my perspective and critical thinking.
about-me.p2: During my academic career I have actively participated in sector conferences and events, developed üè• AppMedik , a beta mobile application for pediatric medical appointment management that exceeded our expectations as a university project, and I completed professional stays at Igeco Mexico, where I worked with technologies such as Astro, React, Tailwind and Node.js. A notable project was the complete redesign of the PIAC, where I implemented a contact section that uses an API and the NPM Resend library for direct mailing.
about-me.p3: What really fascinates me is the data science : that perfect intersection between statistics and technology that transforms complex information into compact insights for strategic decision making. I‚Äôm looking to collaborate on projects that allow me to continue growing as a developer and explore the fascinating world of big data üìä , where I can combine my love of mathematics with innovative technological solutions.
